text: maraka, (allahvutaiya) tutarum avarai nampikkai kontavarkalum (poriliruntu) tankal kutumpattarkalitam oru kalattilum tirumpi varave mattarkal enru ninkal niccayamaka ennik kontiruntirkal. (Atalaltan porukku ninkal varavillai.) Ituve unkal manatil alakakkappattatu. Atalal, ninkal ketta ennattaiye ennik kontiruntirkal. Ninkaltan alintu pokum makkalaka iruntirkal
